policyMappings.description: Evaluates agent executions for safety and resource compliance

soc2Controls.rationale: Ensures agent executions are authorized and comply with access policies
Validates agent changes/actions against documented policies
Ensures agent inputs and outputs meet quality and safety standards

verdictLogic.APPROVED: No safety violations, within resource limits, passed all checks
verdictLogic.REJECTED: Critical safety violations or policy breaches detected

policyMappings.description: Evaluates copilot answers for quality, citations, and compliance

soc2Controls.rationale: Controls access to information through citation and provenance requirements
Documents answer generation process and policy compliance
Ensures answer accuracy through citations, provenance, and confidence scoring

verdictLogic.APPROVED: Sufficient citations, high confidence, passed guardrails
verdictLogic.REJECTED: Failed guardrails or critical quality issues

policyMappings.description: Evaluates refusal decisions for appropriateness and risk

soc2Controls.rationale: Documents access denial decisions with rationale
Tracks refusal decisions as system change events
Ensures refusal decisions are accurate and appropriate

verdictLogic.REJECTED: Policy violations, unsafe queries, authorization failures

policyMappings.description: Validates user prompts for safety and appropriateness

soc2Controls.rationale: Controls input access to prevent unauthorized or malicious requests
Ensures input completeness and accuracy before processing

verdictLogic.REJECTED: Prompt contains malicious content or violates policies

policyMappings.description: Evaluates safety check results and converts to governance verdicts
Emergency rejection when normal verdict generation fails

soc2Controls.rationale: Fail-safe defaults to deny to maintain access controls
Prevents processing when integrity cannot be assured
